reviewText: I've always been interested in the 24th Inf Division.  I was ordered to Korea in 1953 as a 2nd Lt Inf.  I was very fortunate to arrive just after the signing of the end of the war (July 27th).  I was assigned to Co. H, 34th RCT, 24th Inf Division.  Because of this I've had an interest in Military History.  This was acceptable.
